attributes.action: The media should be held accountable for causing a fuelling crisis
attributes.additional_details: I believe the only people who can control the media with the most power is the Government or parliament.
attributes.background: Improve laws on what the media can use as a headline. Stop newspaper Clickbait

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the content of media reporting.
